apple_vendor_description: This depiction of a couple on Apple devices showcases two women with medium-light to light skin tones, sharing a moment of deep affection. The iconic red heart between them pulsates with glossy 3D shading, its smooth gradients and realistic lighting conveying genuine warmth. Appleâ€™s signature soft rounded edges give the figures a friendly and approachable appearance, perfect for expressing love, partnership, and strong bonds.
